channel.title: How do I add yell into my server?
channel.description: My server is up in running in good shape, but the source I'm using doesn't have a yell command. I was wondering how to add one. Also, I don't want to change sources for the yell command, is there any way to add it to my client.java file?

item.title: How do I add yell into my server?
item.dc:creator: @Cyborg101 Cyborg101
item.description:
@Cyborg101 wrote:

My server is up in running in good shape, but the source I’m using doesn’t have a yell command. I was wondering how to add one.
Also, I don’t want to change sources for the yell command, is there any way to add it to my client.java file?

Read full topic
